name: microsoft-bing
label: Microsoft Bing
description: Microsoft Bing is a web search engine it provides a standard web search, as well as specialized searches for images, videos, shopping, news, maps, and other categories.

fields.title: Server URL
fields.description: Specify the URL of the Microsoft Bing server to connect and perform automated operations.
fields.name: server_url
fields.tooltip: Specify the URL of the Microsoft Bing server to connect and perform automated operations.

fields.title: API Key
fields.description: Specify the API key to access the endpoint to connect and perform automated operations.
fields.name: api_key
fields.tooltip: Specify the API key to access the endpoint to connect and perform automated operations.

fields.title: Verify SSL
fields.description: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified. By default, this option is set to True.
fields.name: verify_ssl
fields.tooltip: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified. By default, this option is set to True.

operations.title: Web Search
operations.description: Retrieves results of a search from Microsoft Bing based on the search query and filter parameters you have specified.

parameters.title: Search Query
parameters.description: Specify the search query based on which you want to retrieve details from Microsoft Bing.
parameters.name: q
parameters.tooltip: Specify the search query based on which you want to retrieve details from Microsoft Bing.

parameters.title: Filter Search
parameters.description: Specify the filter search based on which you want to retrieve details from Microsoft Bing.
parameters.name: freshness
parameters.tooltip: Specify the filter search based on which you want to retrieve details from Microsoft Bing. For eg. Day, Week, Month, 2019-02-04, or range in the form 2019-02-01..2019-05-30
parameters.placeholder: For eg. Day, Week, Month, 2019-02-04, or range in the form 2019-02-01..2019-05-30

parameters.title: Response Filter
parameters.description: Select one or more response filters based on which you want to retrieve results from Microsoft Bing. You can select one or more options from following options: Computation, Entities, Images, News, Places, RelatedSearches, SpellSuggestions, TimeZone, Translations, Videos, or Webpages. If you do not specify this parameter, the response includes all search answers for which there's relevant data.
parameters.name: responseFilter
parameters.tooltip: Select one or more response filters based on which you want to retrieve results from Microsoft Bing. You can select one or more options from following options: Computation, Entities, Images, News, Places, RelatedSearches, SpellSuggestions, TimeZone, Translations, Videos, or Webpages. If you do not specify this parameter, the response includes all search answers for which there's relevant data.

parameters.title: Answer Count
parameters.description: Specify the number of answers that you want the response to include; the answers that Bing returns are based on ranking.
parameters.name: answerCount
parameters.tooltip: Specify the number of answers that you want the response to include; the answers that Bing returns are based on ranking. For example, if Bing returns webpages, images, videos, and relatedSearches for a request and you set this parameter to two (2), the response includes webpages and images. If you included the responseFilter query parameter in the same request and set it to webpages and news, the response would include only webpages.

parameters.title: Promote
parameters.description: Select one or more parameters that you want the response to include regardless of their ranking. You can select one or more options from following options: Computation, Entities, Images, News, RelatedSearches, SpellSuggestions, TimeZone, Videos, or Webpages. NOTE: Use only if you specify the Answer Count parameter.
parameters.name: promote
parameters.tooltip: NOTE: Use only if you specify the Answer Count parameter. For example, if you set Answer Count to two (2) so Bing returns the top two ranked answers, but you also want the response to include news, you'd set promote to news. If the top ranked answers are webpages, images, videos, and relatedSearches, the response includes webpages and images because news is not a ranked answer. But if you set promote to video, Bing would promote the video answer into the response and return webpages, images, and videos.

parameters.title: Safe Search
parameters.description: Select a value for safe search based on which to retrieve details from Microsoft Bing. You can select from the following options: Off, Moderate, or Strict. By default, it set to Moderate.
parameters.name: safeSearch
parameters.tooltip:
Note: For video results, if safeSearch is set to Off, Bing ignores it and uses Moderate.
 If the request comes from a market that Bing's adult policy requires that safeSearch be set to Strict, Bing ignores the safeSearch value and uses Strict. 
f you use the site: query operator, there is a chance that the response may contain adult content regardless of what the safeSearch query parameter is set to. Use site: only if you are aware of the content on the site and your scenario supports the possibility of adult content.

parameters.title: Text Decorations
parameters.description: Select this option to return results containing decoration markers such as hit highlighting characters. By default, it set to False.
parameters.name: textDecorations
parameters.tooltip: Select this option to return results containing decoration markers such as hit highlighting characters. By default, it set to False.

parameters.title: Supported Languages
parameters.description: Select the language to use for user interface strings. For supported options, refer to https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/bing/search-apis/bing-web-search/reference/market-codes#bing-supported-language-codes
parameters.name: setLang
parameters.tooltip: Select the language to use for user interface strings. You may specify the language using either a 2-letter or 4-letter code. Using 4-letter codes is preferred.

parameters.title: Country Code
parameters.description: Select one or more country codes from where to fetch the results. It uses the first supported language it finds in the specified languages and combines it with the country code to determine the market for which to return results. For a list of possible values, see https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/bing/search-apis/bing-web-search/reference/market-codes#country-codes.
parameters.name: cc
parameters.tooltip: NOTE: If the languages list does not include a supported language, Bing finds the closest language and market that supports the request. Or, Bing may use an aggregated or default market for the results.

parameters.title: Count
parameters.description: Specify the count of records to fetch from Microsoft Bing. By default, this option is set to 10, and you can set a maximum value of 50.
parameters.tooltip: Count parameter affects only webpage results and has no impact on the number of results that Bing returns for other answers in the search results such as images or videos. By default, this option is set to 10, and you can set a maximum value of 50.
parameters.name: count

parameters.title: Offset
parameters.description: Specify the index of the first item to be returned by this operation. This parameter is useful for pagination and for getting a subset of items. By default, this is set to 0. For each subsequent page, increment offset by 10 (for example, 0, 10, 20). It is possible that multiple pages include some overlap in the results.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the index of the first item to be returned by this operation. This parameter is useful for pagination and for getting a subset of items. By default, this is set to 0. For each subsequent page, increment offset by 10 (for example, 0, 10, 20). It is possible that multiple pages include some overlap in the results.
parameters.name: offset

parameters.title: Additional Fields
parameters.name: additional_fields
parameters.tooltip: Specify additional fields, in JSON format, based on which to retrieve results from Microsoft Bing.
parameters.description: Specify additional fields, in JSON format, based on which to retrieve results from Microsoft Bing.
